players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated Diana. Trust me."

You: "
I am innocent and I believe Bob. Let's discuss more before making any accusations."
Diana: "I'm the mafioso, I killed Charlie to frame him and now I'll kill Bob to make it look like he was investigating me. Trust no one."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
